sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          clearable
          color="grey"
          label="参加者を追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          multiple
          :value="value"
          :items="filteredParticipantUsers"
          @input="$emit('input', $event)"
        >
          <template v-slot:item="{ item }">
            <v-list-item-content>{{ item.name }}</v-list-item-content>
          </template>
          <template v-slot:selection="{ item }">
            <v-chip
              :key="item.id"
              close
              @click:close="remove($event, item)"
            >
              {{ item.name }}
            </v-chip>
          </template>
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'GuestSelectForm',
  props: ['value'],
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('participants', ['participantUsers']),
    filteredParticipantUsers() {
      const excludedUserNames = ['会議室', '車']; // 除外するユーザーの名前
      return this.participantUsers.filter(user => !excludedUserNames.includes(user.name));
    },
  },
  methods: {
    remove(event, item) {
      event.stopPropagation();
      const index = this.value.findIndex(x => x.id === item.id);
      if (index >= 0) {
        this.value.splice(index, 1);
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>
